description: As an IT Analyst, I provided phone-based support to US-based customers experiencing issues with our cloud services. Working the night shift allowed me to actively pursue self-study in HTML and CSS during my downtime.

As a Tech Engineer at GSK, I supported a global team of internal Veeva CRM users and played a key role in the customization of Veeva Events module. I also built custom integrations using Apex and C# when out-of-the-box Veeva CRM/Salesforce solutions were insufficient for our needs.

At EMAKINA.PL, I progressed from a Junior to a Regular Salesforce Developer, where I built integrations with external systems using GraphQL, maintained and enhanced the codebase, and worked on multiple projects to increase my versatility as a developer.

As a software engineer working with Salesforce Core and Salesforce Experience Cloud, I was committed to writing clean, efficient code and encouraging best practices among my team. In addition to my technical responsibilities, I have taken the opportunity to learn React and have been providing guidance and tutelage to less experienced developers on my team.

As a Senior Software Engineer turned Chapter Lead, I bring hands-on experience in Salesforce Core, Experience Cloud, and Copado. Iâ€™m passionate about writing clean, efficient code, mentoring developers, and building a strong culture of technical excellence. In my current role, I lead a team of Software Engineers and work closely with Chapters across the globe to drive collaboration and knowledge sharing.
role: Senior Software Engineer / Chapter Lead Salesforce EU
